clues.text: (Alex airmails one to us from the Atsugi NAF, Japan.)  The mission of the C-2A Greyhound is C.O.D.--the O.D. stands for "onboard delivery", of things like jet engines & other equipment, to the C, this type of ship

clues.answer: Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus
